# Assignments

1. Use Stan to sample from the posterior of a Bernoulli Distribution with a Uniform prior on $p$.
2. Code the Newton-Raphson method, and use it to numerically approximate the maximum value and location of $f(x) = -x^2 + x + 1$. Confirm your solution analytically.
